Common Spanish Adverbs

An adverb is a word that modifies the meaning of a verb, an adjective or another adverb. These are words like now, then, today and carefully. These are many adverbs in Spanish; however, we will only be discussing the most commonly used in Spanish.

Formation

Most adverbs in Spanish are formed by adding -mente to the adjective in the singular form. This is similar to the -ly in English. And when the adjective has a written accent the adverb must retain it.


Adverbs Ending In -mente

  • recientementerecently

    • Estuve recientemente en Polonia y puedo atestiguarlo.

      I was in Poland recently and can confirm this.

    • ¿Has leído algún libro bueno recientemente?

      Have you read any good books recently?

  • brevementeshortly

    • Describiré , muy brevemente, una o dos ideas.

      I will very briefly describe one or two ideas.

    • Permítanme referir brevemente algunos datos y cifras.

      Let me briefly quote a few facts and figures.

  • diariamentedaily

    • Muchos también podrían estar recibiendo correos electrónicos diariamente.

      Many of you may well even be receiving daily e-mails.

    • Están diariamente en conflicto.

      They clash on a daily basis.

  • ocasionalmenteoccasionally

    • Yo lo hago ocasionalmente

      I do it occasionally

    • Sus conocimientos han de someterse ocasionalmente a nuevos exámenes.

      Their knowledge has to be rechecked occasionally over time.

  • previamentepreviously

    • Las empresas te preguntan previamente si deseas algo.

      One is asked in advance if one wants something.

    • Lo que han manifestado previamente sus Señorías acerca de sus experiencias es muy interesante.

      What you said previously about your experiences is very interesting.

  • actualmenteactually

  • frecuentementefrequently

  • semanalmenteweekly

  • rápidamentequickly

  • cuidadosamentecarefully

  • generalmentegenerally

  • anualmenteannually

    • Ellos cambian las reglas anualmente

      They change the rules yearly

    • Yo recibo mi bono anualmente

      I get my bonus annually
